strings.page_1: Bring the First Response® Malaria Antigen P. falciparum (HRP2) Card Test components to room temperature (15-40 ℃) prior to 15 minutes of testing.
strings.page_2: Remove the test Device and the specimen transfer device from the pouch and place it on a flat, dry surface and label the test device with specimen identification number/name
strings.page_3: Wipe the finger with alcohol swab
strings.page_5: Hold the specimen transfer device vertically
strings.page_8: Slowly add 5 µl of whole blood to the specimen well using the specimen transfer device. Dispose of the used Specimen transfer device as biohazardous waste immediate after use
strings.page_9: Add two drops of the assay buffer to the assay buffer well.
strings.page_10: Interpret test results at 20 minutes (after recording the results, dispose of test device as biohazardous waste). Do not interpret after 30 minutes.

strings.page_1: Zana Igisubizo cya mbere® Malariya Antigen P. falciparum (HRP2) Ikizamini cyikarita yubushyuhe bwicyumba (15-40 ℃) mbere yiminota 15 yo kwipimisha.
strings.page_2: Kuraho igikoresho cyikizamini hamwe nigikoresho cyo kwimura ibikoresho mumufuka hanyuma ubishyire hejuru, byumye hanyuma ushireho igikoresho cyibizamini hamwe numero y' ukekwaho indwara cg izina.
strings.page_4: Jomba agashinge kurutoki ukoresheje agashinge kabugenewe
strings.page_5: Fata igikoresho cyo gufata amaraso ukihagaritse bityo ubashe gufata ibipimo by' ikitegererezo
strings.page_7: Zamura agakoresho wifashishije mugufata amaraso y' ikitegererezo
strings.page_8: Buhoro buhoro ongeramo 5 µl yamaraso yose kurugero ukoresheje ibikoresho byoherejwe. Nyuma yo gukoreshwa jugunya agakoresho wakoreshejwe mugufata ibipimo ahagenewe gushyirwa imyanda
strings.page_9: Ongeraho ibitonyanga bibiri by' amaraso muri ako kazu cg akenjye kabugenewe kuri ako gakoresho kagufasha gupima.
strings.page_10: Sobanura ibisubizo by'ibizamini mu minota 20 (nyuma yo kwandika ibisubizo, Bika agakoresho ko gupima ahabugenewe),witanga igisubizo nyuma yiminota 30.
